platform_reports.hackerone:
# Missing Content Security Policy in https://example.com

## Vulnerability Type
No protection against XSS and other injection attacks

## Severity
MEDIUM

## Affected URL
https://example.com

## CVSS Score
5.5 - CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N

## CWE ID
CWE-693

## OWASP Category
A05:2021 - Security Misconfiguration

## Detailed Description
No Content Security Policy header implemented

## Proof of Concept
1. 1. Navigate to target endpoint: https://example.com
2. 2. Check HTTP headers for CSP: MISSING
3. 3. If missing, site lacks XSS protection
4. 4. Test script injection in various contexts
5. 5. Vulnerability confirmed: YES

## Business Impact
XSS vulnerabilities, data theft, compliance violations

## Remediation
- Implement comprehensive Content Security Policy
- Start with restrictive policy and whitelist needed sources
- Test policy thoroughly before deployment

## Timeline
- **Discovery**: 2025-12-01T08:32:00.102529
- **Report**: 2025-12-01T08:32:08.926583
platform_reports.bugcrowd:
**Vulnerability Summary:**
Missing Content Security Policy in https://example.com

**Description:**
No protection against XSS and other injection attacks

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**CVSS:** 5.5

**Affected Endpoint:** https://example.com

**Steps to Reproduce:**
1. 1. Navigate to target endpoint: https://example.com
2. 2. Check HTTP headers for CSP: MISSING
3. 3. If missing, site lacks XSS protection
4. 4. Test script injection in various contexts
5. 5. Vulnerability confirmed: YES

**Evidence:**
Validation confirmed through automated testing framework.

**Business Impact:**
XSS vulnerabilities, data theft, compliance violations

**Recommendations:**
• Implement comprehensive Content Security Policy
• Start with restrictive policy and whitelist needed sources
• Test policy thoroughly before deployment
